ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Does anyone know if the speedups from Anthem/Celerity stack with the Quickness/Alacrity/Celerity line that enchanters and shamans (the first 2) get? On
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>the level 36 celerity song adds a lot of Agility and maybe some attack
>speed, but it does not compare to enchanter's celerity attack speed-up
>spell.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>Erisi, Level 12 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
>>Celerity is a L39 spell and L36
>> song, so I suspect they have the same speedup.
>


Does anyone know if the speedups from Anthem/Celerity
stack with the Quickness/Alacrity/Celerity line that enchanters
and shamans (the first 2) get?

On that same note, does Hymn stack with a shaman's
regeneration/chloroplast line?

Just wondering if anyone has had the opportunity to test
these.

Tindayen the Journeyman Bard
Swifthawk, Apprentice shaman
